Property.name: baseCls
Property.comment: The base CSS class to apply to the progress bar's wrapper element (defaults to 'x-progress')

Property.name: value
Property.comment: A floating point value between 0 and 1 (e.g., .5, defaults to 0) @cfg {String} text The progress bar text (defaults to '') @cfg {Mixed} textEl The element to render the progress text to (defaults to the progress bar's internal text element) @cfg {String} id The progress bar element's id (defaults to an auto-generated id)
